participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Michael is a dedicated and passionate person who enjoys discussing sports and technology.
participant_1.background: i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i'm a male. i've a children and a dogs.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Samantha is ambitious and stylish, with a keen interest in fashion and luxury items.
participant_2.background: my family does not support my career choices. i like shopping. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i currently work for a watch dealer.

content.text: i plan to take a year off and work before starting up college
